title: Post-Service Follow-Up Call
description: A few days after a service visit, an agent calls the customer to ensure everything is working correctly and they are satisfied with the service.

tasks.description: Generate a list of customers who had service completed 3-5 days ago.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a daily call list.

tasks.description: Call the customer and ask about their experience and if their vehicle is performing as expected.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes a courtesy follow-up call.

tasks.description: If the customer is satisfied, thank them. If they report an issue, create a ticket for the service manager to address it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer is satisfied. The agent logs the positive outcome.
